location.text: Use system location or specify coordinates

latitude.label: Latitude (degrees)
latitude.help: Geographic latitude in decimal degrees. North is positive, south is negative. Example: 52.5 (N) for Berlin, -34.6 (S) for Buenos Aires.
latitude.validatorErrorText: Latitude is required when system location is disabled

longitude.label: Longitude (degrees)
longitude.help: Geographic longitude in decimal degrees. East is positive, west is negative. Example: 13.4 (E) for Berlin, -58.4 (W) for Buenos Aires.
longitude.validatorErrorText: Longitude is required when system location is disabled
